title: Two Sum
prompt: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
hints: Try using extra space to speed up the lookup.
A hash map can map value -> index.

title: Valid Parentheses
prompt: Given a string s containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.
hints: Use a stack to match closing brackets with the most recent opening bracket.
